textRuns.value: "Home Church" is a free-text field on a family record (that has to be turned on for your organization). "Community" is a 'group' of member families that can be managed directly in CareTogether. Typically, "Home Church" is used to track a volunteer family's actual home church while "Community" tracks the church they are serving under (which may be different). A family can be part of more than one community at a time (though this is unusual) in which case it will be highlighted in RED -- click to see the other communities.
